programme.title: Khalifahkah Aku
programme.desc: Kisah Fatah anak kepada Datuk Amran dan Datin Marissa. Kedua-dua ibu bapanya sibuk dengan urusan dunia dan kerap alpa dalam urusan ibadat seharian. Mereka menghantar Fatah belajar di sekolah agama dengan harapan dia menjadi anak yang soleh.

programme.title: Talk Back And You'Re Dead
programme.desc: Samantha, seorang wanita yang bijak tetapi naif, jatuh cinta dengan Top, seorang delinkuen panas kepala yang mengetuai kumpulan Lucky 13, dan tertanya-tanya jika hubungan mereka akan kekal.

programme.title: Sesalan Terakhir
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Natasha merupakan anak tidak sah taraf. Hidupnya tidak seperti orang lain. Dia dipinggirkan orang kampung kerana sikap ibunya, Auni, yang sering menjalinkan hubungan dengan lelaki kaya kerana ingin memiliki kekayaan. Puas Natasha menasihati ibunya supaya kembali ke jalan yang benar.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep6
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Taubatku
programme.desc: Setelah lima tahun mendirikan rumah tangga, Ismail dan Maisarah akhirnya dikurniakan seorang anak. Kehidupan mereka semakin bahagia setelah kelahiran Yusuf namun hanya sementara apabila mereka terlibat dalam kemalangan dan Yusuf disahkan lumpuh seumur hidup. Tidak lama selepas itu, Maisarah pula terlibat dalam kemalangan dan meninggal dunia. Dunia Ismail terus berubah, dia harus bekerja keras untuk menjaga Yusuf sehinggakan kebajikan Yusuf mula terabai.

programme.title: Labrak Mantan Auto Manten
programme.desc: Santi tidak menerima berita bahawa mantannya akan menikahi temannya sendiri.

programme.title: Tukul Arwana One Man Show Ep39
programme.desc: Sebuah program bual bicara yang dihoskan Tukul Arwana di Indosiar menyajikan hiburan terbaru yang akan menemani penonton semasa pandemik COVID-19 bersama bintang jemputan, tokoh masyarakat dan mereka yang tular di media sosial.

programme.title: Qari Cilik Season 2 Ep23
programme.desc: Musim kedua program pencarian bakat untuk menghafal al-Quran bagi kanak-kanak sehingga berusia 14 tahun kini kembali. Ikuti musim ini untuk menyaksikan bakat-bakat muda yang hebat dalam dunia penghafalan al-Quran.

programme.title: Kisah Taubatnya Perempuan Penggoda Yang Ingin Masuk Surga
programme.desc: Siska adalah seorang wanita yang menggoda suami orang, menyebabkan ibu dan adiknya merasa malu dengan cemuhan orang sekeliling akibat perbuatan Siska. Suatu hari, Siska dan lelaki yang digodanya terlibat dalam kemalangan mengejut, tetapi hanya Siska yang terselamat. Kejadian ini membuatkan Siska menyedari kesalahannya dan bertaubat.

programme.title: D'Academy 6 Ep26
programme.desc: D'Academy Musim 6 (DA6) merupakan acara pencarian bakat menyanyi dangdut untuk musim keenam D'Academy.

programme.title: Hidayah Cinta Ep36
programme.desc: Gia dianggap pembawa malang sejak lahir dan dijodohkan dengan Aslam yang terkena kutukan Mata Jahat. Masalah demi masalah berlaku selepas perkahwinan mereka. Aslam tidak mencintai Gia kerana hatinya hanya untuk Rati, bekas tunangan yang sangat disayanginya.

programme.title: Qari Cilik Season 2 Ep24
programme.desc: Musim kedua program pencarian bakat untuk menghafal al-Quran bagi kanak-kanak sehingga berusia 14 tahun kini kembali. Ikuti musim ini untuk menyaksikan bakat-bakat muda yang hebat dalam dunia penghafalan al-Quran.

programme.title: Bidadari Surgamu Ep60
programme.desc: Menceritakan kisah seorang gadis bernama Sakinah yang menjalani kehidupan penuh tekanan akibat fitnah dan dipaksa untuk berkahwin dengan seseorang yang tidak mencintainya. Tidak hanya itu, Sakinah juga dihalang untuk mengetahui siapa ibu kandungnya yang tega membuangnya.

programme.title: Dalam Keterpurukan Selalu Ada Harapan
programme.desc: Walaupun Ojan membantu pekerjaan orang tuanya, dia tetap cemerlang di sekolahnya. Ojan juga mempunyai hasrat untuk meningkatkan taraf kehidupan keluarganya dan mengeluarkan mereka dari lembah kemiskinan.

programme.title: Wanthong Ep11
programme.desc: Wan Thong, seorang wanita muda yang cantik dan berani bangkit untuk mempertahankan maruahnya, terjerat dalam hubungan dengan dua lelaki. Dia dibawa ke muka pengadilan, berdepan kecaman awam kerana terperangkap dalam cinta tiga segi dan tidak mampu membuat pilihan. Terhimpit antara lelaki yang dicintainya, namun bukan jenis yang setia, dan seorang lagi yang amat mencintainya tetapi melayannya seperti objek, siapakah yang akhirnya akan menjadi pilihannya?

programme.title: Doyan Makan Ep48
programme.desc: Doyan Makan menjemput penonton untuk mengikuti perjalanan dan pengalaman kulinari untuk makanan popular di kawasan tersebut, serta akan meninjau informasi tentang tempat, harga dan proses penghasilan makanan yang mereka nikmati.

programme.title: Bidadari Surgamu Ep61

programme.title: Den Bagus, Pinjam Cintanya Dong Seratus
programme.desc: Kisah ini mengisahkan seorang pemuda tampan bernama Bagus. Diceritakan bahawa Bagus terlambat menghantar bunga kepada Irene dan kawan-kawannya yang cantik. Namun, anehnya, Bagus tidak dimarahi. Ini kerana semua gadis-gadis itu menyukai Bagus. Bagus berkata kepada Irene, "Bunga yang paling kamu suka adalah mawar. Tapi berhati-hatilah agar tidak salah menyentuhnya, kerana jika tidak, tanganmu akan terluka!" Kemudian, apabila Irene ingin meminjam cinta Bagus seratus, Bagus menyambutnya dengan senyuman yang lebar.

programme.title: Karnaval SCTV 2024 Ep15

programme.title: Den Bagus, Pinjam Cintanya Dong Seratus
programme.desc: Kisah ini mengisahkan seorang pemuda tampan bernama Bagus. Diceritakan bahawa Bagus terlambat menghantar bunga kepada Irene dan kawan-kawannya yang cantik. Laras terus naik ke dalam kereta Jojo untuk melarikan diri. Akhirnya, Laras mengaku bahawa dia seorang telepemasaran.

programme.title: The Magician
programme.desc: A talented young magician falls for a princess betrothed to his former teacher, leading to a fierce showdown between the two powerful magicians.

programme.title: Bottom Of The Water
programme.desc: Ga-young's sister died six year ago. One day, Ga-young is chased by a vengeful water spirit who appears as her sister. She strives to solve the mystery of her sister's tragic death.

programme.title: Love My Scent
programme.desc: After wearing a perfume he receives from a stranger, Chang-Soo earns the ability to attract every woman in the world. Ara begins to sense the scent of Chang-Soo and falls in love with him.

programme.title: Il Mare
programme.desc: A young woman from 1999 and a young man from 1997 begin a parallel-time love story separated by a span of two years when they start to receive each other's letters in the mailbox.

programme.title: Oh! My Ghost
programme.desc: FD Taemin meets a female ghost who lives in the studio he works. As mysterious events happened in the studio, they join hands to investigate and protect his job and her sleeping place.

programme.title: The Royal Tailor
programme.desc: A rivalry between two tailors at the Sanguiwon, the department where the attire worn by royalty were made during the Joseon era, plunges the court into scandal and tragedy.

programme.title: Deranged
programme.desc: A pharmaceutical salesman races against time to save his family when they start to exhibit symptoms of a fatal outbreak that had been causing an epidemic of drownings.

programme.title: 6/45: Lucky Lotto
programme.desc: The excitement of winning a lottery ticket doesnt last long for sergeant Chun-woo as it accidentally ends up crossing the Military Demarcation Line. He must get his act together and find it again!

programme.title: The Closet
programme.desc: After losing his wife, a father tries to start over in a new home with his daughter. But things take a turn when strange noises trickle out of the closet, and his daughter goes missing.

programme.title: Ashfall
programme.desc: When a volcano straddling the ChinaNorth Korea border erupts, earthquakes ensue causing pandemonium in both North and South Korea.

programme.title: A Little Princess
programme.desc: A woman's life takes a turn for the better when she meets her granddaughter for the first time.

programme.title: Hello Ghost
programme.desc: A man has many failed suicide attempts. After the most recent one, he discovers he can see a family of ghosts. The ghosts agree to leave him alone under the condition that he fulfill their requests.

programme.title: Life Is Beautiful
programme.desc: Se-yeon, devoted her entire life to her family, suddenly learns she is gravely ill. Now she is determined to live for herself more than ever and looks for her first love with the help of her husband.

programme.title: The Spies
programme.desc: Kim, a North Korean spy who had lived in South Korea for 22 years is suddenly contacted by his superior. His team plans to complete an earlier mission and steal the target's large stockpile of cash.

programme.title: Ashfall
programme.desc: When a volcano straddling the ChinaNorth Korea border erupts, earthquakes ensue causing pandemonium in both North and South Korea.

programme.title: The Foodie Journey Season 2 Ep22
programme.desc: Chinese food culture is vast and profound, with each region having its own signature dishes. Everyone has different memories associated with food. This program explores the stories behind delicious food and preserves Chinese culinary culture.

programme.title: The Inheritors Season 3 Ep18
programme.desc: Intangible Cultural Heritage refers to the behavior or performance which is important for cultural inheritance in a certain district, such as folk custom, culture, beliefs, traditions, etc. As the theme of this program, the results of protection of intangible cultural heritage could be demonstrated and promoted comprehensively.

programme.title: Whisper’s dishes Season 4 Ep13
programme.desc: Gourmet food as the media of the new cultural interview program, each episode invited cultural celebrities, celebrity chefs, foreign handsome men, live network red and folk gourmets guests together to visit the meal, in tasting folk delicious at the same time, share the life story.

programme.title: WOW Club Ep11
programme.desc: Six comedians from Northeast China, Jian Jun Tang, Xiaoli Wang, Bing Yang, Song Wen, Tianwa and Yunpeng Zhou, are invited to join the first Northeast characteristic comedy detective variety show. They visit towns and cities from a new perspective and look for childhood memories, bringing witty real-time interaction, three-dimensional display of the amazing urban style and cultural charm of the region.

programme.title: The Foodie Journey Season 2 Ep22
programme.desc: Chinese food culture is vast and profound, with each region having its own signature dishes. Everyone has different memories associated with food. This program explores the stories behind delicious food and preserves Chinese culinary culture.

programme.title: Study On The Island Season 2 Ep7
programme.desc: The bookstore is located in the healing Dong'ao Island of Zhuhai; it mainly focuses on the relationship between a certain emotion and literature in people's daily life; through the dialogue and exchange of "bookstore managers", which spiritual healing is obtained from it.

programme.title: Singing With Legends Season 6 (Repackaged) Ep3
programme.desc: The program has been refreshed and upgraded, departing from its initial structure. The topic of the show is "Listening to the Voice of the World, Singing With Legends." The musical extravaganza that will be created is full of infinite vitality and features over 30 singers, including Liu Yuning, Mao Buyi, Ma Jiaqi, Leo Ku, Hacken Lee, Tengger, and Gong Linna. The goal is to get back to the core of music and work together to produce fusion hits that will increase opportunities for collaboration and communication amongst the artists.

programme.title: Tenday Ep17
programme.desc: 39 well-known competitors from a variety of industries, including Nicky Wu, Michelle Chen, Neo Hou, Lin Gengxin, and Shen Yue, are invited to participate in an immersive survival reality TV series. The show involves living in a real metropolis for 10 straight days in a closed-off setting. They will encounter tasks that will put their cooperation, mental, physical, and psychological faculties to the test. The champion will be the ultimate victor.

programme.title: The Melody of You (Repackaged) Ep3
programme.desc: This is a collective team-building activity exclusive to musicians. Seven musicians from different cities gathered together and embarked on a music-oriented social and healing journey. During the trip, they form pairs and perform six dual music showcases, seeking their most compatible musical partners. They express themselves, cheer for friendship, and sing with emotion.

programme.title: Ready To Dance Ep5
programme.desc: The top brand leader has sent their youth dance team to the famous 7th District, the ultimate destination for outstanding dancers, to battle for the last position. The young dancers, led by organizer Zhu Zhengting and special coaches Even Wong and NAME, are continually competing and performing to win a badge for their brand. These dedicated young people are giving it their best. Which team will ultimately become China's strongest youth dancing squad?

programme.title: Melody Journey (Repackaged) Ep1
programme.desc: This is the first original music performance program, which has invited singers such as Joker Xue, Jane Zhang, Zhou Shen, Shan Yichun, and Lars Huang. In addition to numerous emerging original music artists, it has also attracted veteran musicians such as Xiao Ke, Vincent Fang, and Huang Kuo-lun. The program consists of two core segments: a debut stage and a competition for an original song. This singer-songwriter interaction provides them a cooperative platform to produce a brand-new highlight for the Mandarin music scene.

programme.title: The Inheritors Season 3 Ep18
programme.desc: Intangible Cultural Heritage refers to the behavior or performance which is important for cultural inheritance in a certain district, such as folk custom, culture, beliefs, traditions, etc. As the theme of this program, the results of protection of intangible cultural heritage could be demonstrated and promoted comprehensively.

programme.title: Rap Star Dream Maker (Repackaged) Ep8
programme.desc: Jay Chou gathered Will Liu, Dylan Wang, and four label managers GAI & Bridge, MC Jin, Xiao Gui, Air & Zao An, VaVa, and D-SHINE, they provide escort and support for the new generation of rap artists in their dream pursuit journey. Breaking from the traditional mentor-led model, they established true mentor-mentee relationships to co-create unique rap labels, and aim to inspire rapper creativity through competitive performances to find the next rap superstar.

programme.title: Travel With The Royal Family Ep10
programme.desc: Reunited for the first time in thirteen years were Ada Choi, Tao Xin-ran, Xi Lan, Zhang Xiao-long, Lan Ying-ying, Chen Si-si, and Yang Jiu-lang. Beginning from Daguanyuan in Beijing, the filming location of the top-leading drama "Empresses in the Palace", they traveled to various ethnic cultural origins. Through in-depth exploration and study, they experienced the local customs and culture, carrying with them both nostalgic memories and new aspirations, completing their "Rejuvenation Journey" across China.

programme.title: China's Public Opinion Field Ep42
programme.desc: Brings media professionals, commentators and on-line opinion leaders into the studio to express views on current issues.

programme.title: Across the Strait Ep301
programme.desc: The Across the Strait traces the much-discussed issues across the Strait, reflects the will of the citizens on two sides of the Strait and details the Chinese Governments policy of one country, two systems in a bid to enhance the Taiwan fellowmens understanding of the Mainland China.

programme.title: China News
programme.desc: It concentrates on the latest news and social changes happening in china and all over the world

programme.title: Focus Today
programme.desc: Traces the current affairs from china and the world

programme.title: Bond with China Ep43
programme.desc: Bond with China, which is produced by China Media Group China Central Television International Channel, is a large-scale intercultural communication documentary program.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep156
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep4979
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2257
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3902
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Walker Fun Kaohsiung (M) Ep226227
programme.desc: Walker Fun Kaohsiung is a travel reality show that takes viewers on an exciting journey through the vibrant city of Kaohsiung. With 35 different routes, the show explores the citys hidden gems, local culture, and unique experiences. From bustling night markets to serene temples, Walker Fun Kaohsiung showcases the best of Kaohsiung.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep31
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Taichung Player (M) Ep6162
programme.desc: The vibrant Chin-Lan Chang hosts a captivating journey through Taichung's cultural and creative industries, unique attractions, community initiatives, local arts, and heartfelt human stories. This show offers a rich blend of fun and learning, ensuring every moment is both enjoyable and enlightening.

programme.title: Top Singers (T) Ep640
programme.desc: The show 'Top Singers' aims to spotlight outstanding Taiwanese singers and composers, setting a new standard in the industry. Combining elements of competition, variety, and personal stories, the show welcomes participants of all ages. Its goals include discovering grassroots talent, innovating Taiwanese song performance styles, and involving more local talent in song composition to infuse new life into Taiwanese music.

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep980
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: Dear Mom (M) Ep1213
programme.desc: Feng-Yi Li handles everything in the house while her husband, Shu-An, lounges and daydreams. She constantly worries about the love lives of their four daughters. Yi-Wan starts a relationship with a gang leaders son despite claiming to have never dated. Qing-Qing may be having an affair with a married man. Xiao-Xi is infatuated with the school team captain but is unaware of "the others." An-Qing returns from the US with her son after a failed marriage. When Feng-Yi suddenly disappears, the sisters realize they've neglected their mother, who has always supported them. Now they must find her and get their lives back on track.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1062
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Battle Tour (M) Ep74
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep980981
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep744
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep519
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Gung Hay Fat Choy (M) Ep89
programme.desc: In a bad economy, many people dream of becoming rich overnight, especially the Jiang family. Mother Jiang pushes her three children to earn money so that they can one day live in luxury. Even her daughter-in-law wishes for the same thing. She hopes that one day she can visit her parents with the money that spills out of her purse.

programme.title: Kung Fu Dunk
programme.desc: Shi Jie grew up in a martial arts school and possesses an extraordinary shooting skill. Street hustler Chen Li sees his talent and arranges for him to join a university basketball team. With his kung fu dunking skill, Shi Jie manages to win all college basketball matches, bringing him wealth and also strengthening his relationship with Chen Li.

programme.title: All U Need is Love
programme.desc: Ten major film companies join forces on a comedy-drama film to raise funds and create jobs for industry workers during the COVID-19 pandemic. This film features an all-star ensemble cast starring for free, with the story revolving around a group of hotel guests placed under quarantine in Hong Kong.

programme.title: 77 Heartwarmings
programme.desc: After breaking up with Adam, Eva focuses on her career but Adam still wants to make up and tries to move her 77 times. Things become more complicated when a Thai movie idol courts Eva. It is at this time that Evas mother becomes very ill, and she considers marriage in order to fulfil her mothers wish. Will Adam succeed in warming Evas heart?

programme.title: Dragon Tiger Gate
programme.desc: Adapted from a famous Hong Kong comic, Tiger Wong is ambushed after he unwittingly took the Lousha Plaque but is saved by his brother Dragon Wong. They also befriended Turbo Shek during the fight and the trio forms a brotherhood. To avenge the death of the Dragon Gate masters, they train and vow to defeat Shibumi, the leader of Lousha Clan.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs II
programme.desc: In this prequel, the secrets of Infernal Affairs are revealed - the resentment between police superintendent Wong and crime boss Sam, as well as the beginning of the parallel fates of the two moles, Yan and Ming. The keys lie in the hands of Sam's wife, a ruthless kingpin and a righteous cop.

programme.title: Chilli Laugh Story
programme.desc: Coba is forced to work at home during COVID-19 and fights with his family every day. He decides to turn his mothers chilli sauce into a trendy commodity to keep his family occupied. With his mother, father and aunt making the chilli sauce together, the family sells it online and the business grows beyond their imagination.

programme.title: Ashes of Time Redux
programme.desc: After his beloved woman married his brother, Ou Yang Feng moves to the desert to run an inn and becomes a killer agent. He makes acquaintance of different people with their different stories ... The movie is the winner of the 1st Hong Kong Film Critics Society Awards for Best Film, Best Director, Best Screenplay and Best Actor (Leslie Cheung).

programme.title: The Italian Recipe
programme.desc: Famous pop idol Peng travels to Rome for a reality show and encounters an ordinary girl, Mang, who dreams of becoming a great chef after migrating to Italy. Peng and Mang have nothing in common but spend a magical night in Rome together. Their lives begin to change as the two start to fall in love.

programme.title: Turns We Take
programme.desc: A spicy hot pot restaurant in Northeast China serves different types of customers every day. Amongst them are a sweet young couple, two wayward young men and a taxi driver. Despite being complete strangers to each other, their lives are intertwined by a traffic accident

programme.title: Men Suddenly in Love
programme.desc: Five high-school alumni - councilor Ng Yuk Yan, actor Cheung Chau Wan, gynecologist Fu Mo Sum, feng shui master Szeto Kei Fung, and dance coach Charlie Lam - get together to throw a birthday party for their respected teacher Mr. Chu, who enlightened them about the birds and the bees. Five delectable young models appear at the party, during which the 80-year-old educator gets too excited and unfortunately kicks the bucket - but not before telling his pupils to fulfill his last wish and get a little naughty! The quintet of married men then takes it upon themselves to conquer the babes, all the while trying to evade the watchful eye of their wives.

programme.title: Acting Out of Love
programme.desc: Wei Hung Jen is a struggling actor who gets fired but finds a job behind the scene. Hui Hsin, the associate producer, must write a script for a love story so as to get a reference letter to study scriptwriting overseas. As Jen falls for Hui, he invites her out on a date as a research for her script and they start acting out of love.

programme.title: Crypto Storm
programme.desc: ICAC investigation officer Lok sets up a special team to investigate a corruption case involving a banks top executives use of cryptocurrency to manipulate the trading market. When the banks chairman is kidnapped and kidnappers demand ransom in crypto coins, Lok connects the dots and vows to hunt down the mastermind behind both crimes.

programme.title: Initial D
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from a famous Japanese manga. 18-year-old Takumi delivers tofu in his father's near-obsolete car every day and becomes a good racer with perfect drifting skill. Encouraged by his father, he joins a mountain race and unexpectedly wins it, making him famous overnight and leading him from one exciting race to another.

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: A killer and a stage actor accidentally swapped their identities at a bathhouse. The actor must complete the killers mission while the killer thinks he is a hopeless actor after losing his memory during the accident. When the killer strives to become a successful stage actor, he also starts to recall what has happened

programme.title: Call Me Agent
programme.desc: Miu Ling dreams of becoming a secret agent. Even though it seems impossible, she still harbours such a dream and hopes that it will soon come true. One day, Miu Ling rescues an injured secret agent who promises to make her his apprentice. From then on, her life is turned upside down and she goes onto a roller-coaster of madcap adventures.

programme.title: The Monkey King 3
programme.desc: Monkey King, Pigsy and Sandy escort Monk Tang to retrieve the scriptures and accidentally head into the mysterious Female Kingdom. The Queen falls in love with Monk Tang at first sight, but her advisor orders Monk Tang and his disciples to be executed. As the four attract the appearance of River Spirit, the Female Kingdom is plunged into crisis!

programme.title: One and Only
programme.desc: Veteran street dancer Ding Lei, invites passionate street dancer, Chen Shuo to his dance club. Sparks fly when Chen dances with the clubs top dancers. Chen pursues his dream to perform but discovers that Ding has invited him for another reason. As both of them deal with hard times, can they turn the tide on the challenges that they are facing?

programme.title: The Grand Grandmaster
programme.desc: Ma Fei Lung, a Chinese martial arts grandmaster, lost everything after he is floored by a former female boxing champion, Chan Tsang. The relevant video was posted on social media and he became the laughing stock of everyone. To reclaim his reputation, Fei Lung challenges Chan Tsang to a rematch. Who will be the winner?

programme.title: P Storm
programme.desc: Ping reports a case of a rich mans son bribing prison guards to cover up his criminal activities in the prison to the ICAC. ICAC officer Luk goes undercover in prison to conduct his investigation. Despite the risks involved, Luk is determined to complete his mission with the help of his cell mate, Wang.

programme.title: Mad Fate
programme.desc: A Master fortune teller predicts that Tung, a born psychopath, will be imprisoned for murder and tries to change his fate. A veteran detective believes Tung is a psychopathic serial killer after witnessing him kill a cat, and pursues him relentlessly. Can the Master change Tungs mad fate?

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey of a Boxer
programme.desc: Ah Niu learns boxing from Uncle Xing, the boss of a boxing studio, since young and uses his skills to help the weak fight villains. When Xings son attempts drug trafficking to save his fathers studio but fails and is brutally beaten up, Ah Niu accepts a death combat challenge so as to help him take revenge.

programme.title: Distinction
programme.desc: A music teacher in a special needs school, an underachiever from an elite school, and a rebellious teenager with a handicapped brother take part in a campus musical for various reasons. Little did they know that this turns out to be a journey of self-discovery.

programme.title: Everything is Unknown
programme.desc: Pan Yi Ming receives his father's will stating that he must attend his funeral at home to claim the huge inheritance. When he returns home, he encounters his ex-girlfriend, her husband Hua Qi and his daughter whom he has never met. When Pan discovers that his daughter is being abused by Hua, he vows to save her but eventually fall into their trap

programme.title: The Captain
programme.desc: The movie is based on a real incident of Sichuan Airlines Flight 8633 on 14 May 2018. When the cockpit windshield shatters after takeoff, the Captain manages to land the airplane safely with his level-headed swift actions and sheer determination. This is lauded as a miracle in airline history.

programme.title: Love For All Seasons
programme.desc: May, acting leader of the Er Mei sect, cures the incurable illness of Tiger, a rich playboy. Under the threat of her senior, May seeks help from Tiger to experience heartbreak and master the "Heartbroken Sword" style, so as to defeat her senior and preserve Er Mei sect. Will this strange and long-winding relationship reach a happy ending?

programme.title: Imprisoned 2: There Is No Escape From Fate
programme.desc: Hong Kong businessman Yu and his secretary travel abroad for business meetings. When the secretary is killed in their hotel, Yu is arrested. Despite pleading not guilty, Yu is imprisoned in a cruel multinational prison where the warden enjoys torturing prisoners, and he must find a way to escape from this dark and deadly prison to survive.

programme.title: Flirting Scholar 2
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Tang Bo Hu and his three buddies before they become the four great talents in Jiangnan. Tang Bo Hu encounters a beautiful girl when studying in a monastery and they quickly fall in love, but her hidden identity is accidentally unveiled when Tang and friends uncover a conspiracy at the monastery.

programme.title: Somewhere Winter
programme.desc: The film follows the love story of a university student, An Ran and a Taiwanese man, Qi Xiao. They met and fell in love at a concert by Chyi Chin, a Taiwanese singer, in Beijing in 1991. However, courage alone may not be enough for the lovers to stay together, and goodbyes may truly mean the end. Will An Ran and Qi Xiao meet again in 2019?

programme.title: WE12
programme.desc: An underground organization, The League of Kaito has been maintaining international order. While 12 elite members possess extraordinary skills and have worked independently for a period of time, they must rekindle their long-lost team spirit to accomplish a mission together to save the world from disaster.

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: An extreme sports lover accidentally gets involved in an illegal trading activity by international crime syndicates. Led by international special agent Bruce, he forms an amateur unit with a police officer, an inventor and a doctor to fight the crime syndicates together, leading to a series of thrilling and hilarious adventures.

programme.title: Last Suspect
programme.desc: Lawyer Chen receives a mysterious call demanding her to defend a murder suspect after her daughter is kidnapped, and is told that she can only save her daughter by winning the case. As she starts investigation with the police and evidence emerges, Chen discovers the truth and reveals the mastermind. Can she rescue her daughter in time?

programme.title: The Moon Thieves
programme.desc: A crooked watch dealer assembles a daring crew - a thief, an explosive expert, a lock breaker and a watch connoisseur - to steal three luxury watches in Tokyo. Their mission takes an unexpected turn when they discover the legendary 'Moonwatch.' Pursued by the yakuza, the team must unite to navigate the chaos and pull off their high-stakes heist.

programme.title: Five Tough Guys
programme.desc: A titular gang of misfits come together to protect a patriotic general from a scheming usurper. To this end, the unlikely heroes act as the generals escorts on a dangerous journey to a distant British consulate, beset by enemies and sinister Japanese interference along the way.

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: To the tune of the Osmonds hit song, this is a story of adolescent playfulness & innocence lost. Two best friends grow up together and teasingly meet two delightfully impish boys leading to the four to flirtatiously intermingle. However, the innocence of partner swapping eventually leads to a roller-coaster bouts of misunderstood emotions.

programme.title: The Bully
programme.desc: For lovers of the Shaw's sumptuous production and martial arts expertise, this action adventure in the "Jackie Chan style" is a special treat. A persecuted waiter turns to a "drunken master" for help when a restaurant customer turns out to be a kung-fu harbinger of doom!

programme.title: The Tiger And The Widow
programme.desc: The Liu Chia-liang trained Hui Ying-hung was considered the top action martial arts female star in the 1980s. It is her martial arts abilities that Michelle Yeoh tries to emulate. In The Tiger and the Widow, Hui Ying-hung is somehow mixed up in a salt smuggling ring that stinks of missing persons and rotten dilemmas.

programme.title: A Place To Call Home
programme.desc: Li Ching, star of Sweet is Revenge, plays one of three daughters, whose life is turned upside down when she discovers she is adopted. But things get even worse when she goes in search of her real mother. Finally, after what is almost a double tragedy, she realizes what so many knew all along: There's no place like home.

programme.title: Pursuit Of A Killer
programme.desc: The charm of Pursuit Of A Killer lies in the long awaited reunion of Five Venoms duo, Lo Meng and Sun Chien; Lo Meng, who plays a Mainland Chinese criminal escapee to Hong Kong in search of a better life, and a cop (Sun Chien) who helps him adjust to Hong Kong life while tracking down his mysterious killer at the same time.

programme.title: Hong Kong 73
programme.desc: In 1973, the Hong Kong Heng Seng Index hit extraordinary peaks and people from all walks of life go stock market crazy. Meanwhile, Hong Kong's social problems build up without anyone paying attention to what are actually happening to the crazy lives of people, in this mad city that many call home...

programme.title: Six Assassins
programme.desc: Lord Li Ming is a feudal tyrant who oppresses the people, and even the Emperor who is his brother, cannot stop his evil act. Righteous swordsman Mu poses as Li Mings guard to plan for his assassination. He arrests six assassins who have tried to kill Li Ming, before making them his allies in a secret plot to kill him and end the tyranny.

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperors death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: Twin Blades Of Doom
programme.desc: A retired martial artist is forced to return with a vengeance after his family and friends are murdered by the evil Ghost Gang. He decides to challenge the gangs leader to a deadly duel so as to take revenge. Can he defeat the ruthless leader in the end?

programme.title: The 5 Billion Dollar Legacy
programme.desc: A crippled billionaire mails a letter to each of his long-lost daughters inviting them to go to Japan, in the hope that he will find a worthy heir to inherit his vast fortune. The sisters finally meet abroad the plane to Japan, and one of them is taken with a man who is going to investigate the death of his lawyer uncle in a mysterious hit-and-run.

programme.title: The Eunuch
programme.desc: A year before Lo Wei directed Bruce Lee in Fist Of Fury, he wrote and co-starred in this tale of a treacherous devil who wants nothing less than supreme power...and doesn't care if he has to murder the Emperor and use his own daughter as a deadly dupe to get it.

programme.title: My Rebellious Son
programme.desc: A corrupt official attempts to steal a priceless Buddha statue from a temple to please a group of Westerners. Luckily, Doctor Zhang and his son manage to defeat the Western boxers, the Japanese Kendo opponents and the Western longsword fighters with Chinese kung fu, thus saving the Buddha statue.

programme.title: Rear Entrance
programme.desc: Mrs Xu is childless and watches a lonely little girl playing at the rear entrance from afar every day. She warmly nurtures the girl and even adopts her from her uncaring parent. The girl brings happiness to the Xus until her long lost mother appears one day and to make her happy, Mrs Xu reluctantly lets the girl reunite with her mother.

programme.title: Five Elements Ninjas
programme.desc: The film is about a Chinese martial arts school finds itself outclassed by their rivals, they hire elite ninja from Japan to destroy the school. The lone survivor of the massacre learns the secrets of ninjutsu and seeks revenge against the ninja.

programme.title: The Voyage Of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung continues his incognito voyage to southern China. Accompanied by the minister and the imperial scholar, they have many amusing encounters in Yangzhou.

programme.title: The Kid With The Golden Arm
programme.desc: The government hires Yang to escort a cargo of gold to a famine stricken area. The vicious Chi Sha gang, with one of their best fighters, Golden Arm, announce their intention to hijack it by killing one of Yang's employees. As Yang gathers his own team of reputable fighters to protect his cargo, are they strong enough to hold off Golden Arm?

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: Shadow Girl
programme.desc: A young swordswoman becomes invisible during the day and a monster at night after taking her grandmas pill. She ruined the wedding of a bandit chiefs daughter using her powers and is hunted down by them for revenge. Will she escape the hunt?

programme.title: Two Con Men
programme.desc: Two Con Men is a wonderfully twisted, pseudo-romantic comedy in the vein of "Robin Hood" meets "The Sting". Starring Liang Tien as Clever Chan and Chang Ying (who's done over 400 films) as Tricky Ching, it's the age-old competition between a rookie con artist versus the ultimate, experienced flimflam man. It's a game Chen cannot afford to lose, because people's lives - including his own, hang in the balance of good versus evil.

programme.title: The Deadly Breaking Sword
programme.desc: Warrior Tuan Chang Qing meets courtesan Liu Yin Xi in a small town. Liu pleads Tuan to kill the underworld master Guo Tian Sheng, known as the "Killer Doctor", in order to avenge the death of her fiance. Tuan and gambling addict Xiao Dao breaks into Guo's household, triggering the battle of good against evil.

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: Judgement Of An Assassin
programme.desc: An evil clan plans a discord so as to dominate the martial arts world. Their masked assassins massacre another clan and one of the assassins is arrested and brought to trial at a tribunal of all the clans. What judgement will they make and can they uncover the truth?

programme.title: Fangs Of The Cobra
programme.desc: Incredibly, the title serpent is not a harbinger of horror, but actually the film's hero. This virtuous viper sniffs out bombs, fights gangs, battles a baby-killing rodent and even takes on a duplicitous woman. This one-of-a-kind thriller will be applauded by reptile fans everywhere.

programme.title: The Battle Wizard
programme.desc: Dali Prince Tuan Yu knows nothing about martial arts, but leaves the palace for the martial arts world. He meets a snake sorceress and his mysterious half-sister. Through various misadventures, Tuan Yu gains invincible power by sucking the cobras blood and swallowing the magic toad, eventually defeating his fathers old rival.

programme.title: Mr. Funnybone Strikes Again
programme.desc: In this hilarious sequel, Mr Big Potato opens an old-fashioned Chinese clinic, but his traditional methods are rejected by the sceptics of modern Hong Kong. Enter his buddy Mr Funny bone to rescue his business!

programme.title: Return Of The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This sequel makes for more bittersweet laughs and heart-wrenching misfortune, as Ah Niu gets out of the jail to find his true love becoming the wife of an abusive husband, and his uncle further exploits his naive nature.

programme.title: Mad Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Master Chen was an esteemed Monkey Kung Fu master, until he is framed and crippled by a ruthless villain and ends up becoming a wandering artiste. When Chen meets a young man, Little Monkey, on the streets, he decides to teach him all his monkey kung fu moves. Both men eventually team up to avenge Chens past insult.

programme.title: The Happy Trio
programme.desc: Ah Chiao, a village girl stranded in the city, befriends a kind-hearted tramp and a retired actor. They are poor but happy, though Ah Chiaos fortune change for the better when she becomes a singer. However, she soon learns that money cannot buy one happiness...

programme.title: Godfather Of Canton
programme.desc: A docker, Lin Si Hai, accidentally saves Commissioner Cheng who then offers him a position in the police force. Lin is smart and soon rises through the ranks through treachery and corruption, before becoming a gangster.

programme.title: The Blue And The Black
programme.desc: Set during the Japanese occupation in World War II, a young orphan Tang Qi falls in a love with a young man Chang. However, their love is filled with challenges, from family pressure to the turmoil of war. When Tang Qi was raped, she is expelled from home to become a nightclub singer and embarks on a journey of no return

programme.title: Crazy Nuts Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: A roadside bandit and a traveling gambler team up to make money from gambling. In a successful attempt to steal a huge amount of money from a warlords home, they encounter revolutionists who seek their help to fund the reform campaign. Will the two help the revolutionists cause with the stolen money?

programme.title: Crocodile River
programme.desc: This story has a Romeo and Juliet flavour. Two families who hate each other live across the opposite sides of a river filled with crocodiles and do not bother to have a bridge built. Their respective children meet in university and fall in love, but have to find ways to be together and resolve the hatred between their families.

programme.title: The Shaolin Avengers
programme.desc: Hu seeks to avenge his father who is being killed by the White-Browed Hermit and his gang. However, he fails in his attempt and is saved by Fang Shi Yu, a youth from Shaolin whose parents are also killed by the same villains. They learn and master the advanced Shaolin style kung fu, before Fang leads Hu and the Shaolin fellows to fight the enemies.

programme.title: Let'S Fall In Love
programme.desc: Da Yung, the son of a rich entrepreneur, meets Lian Lian, the niece of a kindergarten principal by chance. They get into a misunderstanding at the first meeting, causing Da Yung to lose his wallet. Further misunderstanding occurs when he tries to use her to act as his fianc, in order to drive away two women whom he does not like

programme.title: Killer Darts
programme.desc: A group of bandits raided the village where dart master Liu lives and killed his wife. While hunting them down, Lius disciple kills a farmer and his wife when she refuses his advances, leading Liu to adopt their orphaned daughter and raises her with his son. Years later, the daughter meets a man with the bandits and is tricked to go against Liu.

programme.title: Super Duper
programme.desc: Two swindlers take up a kidnapping assignment for some quick money. However, when they end up kidnapping the wrong woman, they land in trouble with a drug lord.

programme.title: Azhigiya Laila Ep167
programme.desc: A rural village girl meets a guy, unexpectedly falls in love with him and fights the patriarchal system whilst fleeing from bandits.

programme.title: Vetri Vinayakar Ep266
programme.desc: When Lord Shiva beheads Ganesha, unaware that he is his son, Goddess Parvati asks Shiva to resurrect him. Later, Ganesha emerges as one of the most worshipped deities in the Hindu pantheon.

programme.title: Dharma Chakra
programme.desc: A young man and girl who are medical students fall in love with each other. However, when they are about to get married, he disappears leaving a heartbroken fiancee behind.

programme.title: Alaipayuthey Ep71
programme.desc: Zain and Aliya are two headstrong individuals who cannot see eye to eye on anything. However, after spending time with each other, they fall in love and want to stay together.

programme.title: Shiva Shakthi Thiruvilayadal Ep173
programme.desc: Lord Shiva and his wife, Goddess Parvati, navigate their relationship and duties and offer sacrifices and brave separation to selflessly care for humanity.

programme.title: Shiva Shakthi Thiruvilayadal Ep174
programme.desc: Lord Shiva and his wife, Goddess Parvati, navigate their relationship and duties and offer sacrifices and brave separation to selflessly care for humanity.

programme.title: Sangadam Theerkum Saneeswaran Ep40

programme.title: Jonah Hex
programme.desc: Oscar nominee Josh Brolin plays Jonah Hex, a scarred drifter and bounty hunter who can track down anyone...and anything. Having survived death, Jonah's violent history is steeped in myth and legend - leaving him with one foot in the natural world and one on the "other side." His only human connection is with Lilah (Transformers' Megan Fox), whose life in a brothel has left her with scars of her own. But Jonah's past is about to catch up with him when the U.S. military makes him an offer he can't refuse: in exchange for his freedom, he must track down and stop the dangerous terrorist Quentin Turnbull (Oscar nominee John Malkovich). But Turnbull, who is gathering an army and preparing to unleash Hell, is also Jonah's oldest enemy and will stop at nothing until Jonah is dead. Based on the legendary graphic novel, this epic adventure thriller gives a new face to the comic book genre by combining the Western genre with supernatural elements.

programme.title: This Is Where I Leave You
programme.desc: When their father passes away, four grown siblings (Jason Bateman, Tina Fey, Adam Driver, Corey Stoll), bruised and banged up by their respective adult lives, are forced to return to their childhood home and live under the same roof together for a week, along with their over-sharing mother (Jane Fonda) and an assortment of spouses, exes and might-have-beens. Confronting their history and the frayed states of their relationships among the people who know and love them best, they ultimately reconnect in hysterical and emotionally affecting ways amid the chaos, humor, heartache and redemption that only families can provide-- driving us insane even as they remind us of our truest, and often best, selves. Comedy director Shawn Levy (Date Night)helms the hilarious script by Jonathan Tropper based on his own best-selling novel.

programme.title: Twilight
programme.desc: A troubled teenage girl moves in with her dad in a small isolated town. She falls for a mysterious loner with a shocking secret - could he be anything to do with the local murders that have started taking place?

programme.desc: Bella is heartbroken when the Cullen family decide to move away in order to put a stop to her relationship with vampire Edward. She seeks comfort in friend Jacob, and starts to wonder if there could be more between them.

programme.desc: As a string of mysterious killings grip Seattle, Bella, whose high school graduation is fast approaching, is forced to choose between her love for vampire Edward and her friendship with werewolf Jacob.

programme.desc: Bella and Edward find their lives in turmoil after discovering she is pregnant. It's not long before her health is suffering, while meanwhile the wolf pack suspect the child could be their downfall.

programme.desc: The birth of Bella and Edwards child ignites forces that threaten to destroy them all as tensions build toward all-out war between the Cullens and the Volturi in the thrilling conclusion to the epic phenomenon.

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: A blind girl receives a cornea transplant so that she is able to see again. However, she gets more than she bargains for when she realizes she can see disturbing ghosts.

programme.title: Horsemen

programme.title: The Crow
programme.desc: A man brutally murdered comes back to life as an undead avenger of his and his fiance's murder.

programme.title: Scream 4
programme.desc: Neve Campbell, Courtney Cox, and David Arquette resurrect their famous roles in this spine-chilling sequel. Ghostface returns to Woodsboro but its a new decade, with new rules.

programme.title: The Eye

programme.title: Insomnia

programme.desc: Dwayne Johnson has been framed for a fire on The Pearl. A wanted man on the run, Will must find those responsible, clear his name and somehow rescue his family who is trapped inside the building...above the fire line.

programme.title: Seattle Superstorm
programme.desc: When a massive storm threatens the Pacific Northwest, a family must find each other and work together to put a stop to the storm before it spreads beyond their control and annihilates the planet!

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: When a kingpin threatens New York City, a news reporter find a quad of mutants which makes an alliance to unravel Shredder's plan as the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles.

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: Columbus has made a habit of running from what scares him. Tallahassee doesn't have fears. In a world overrun by zombies, these two are perfectly evolved survivors. But now, they're about to stare down the most terrifying prospect of all: each other.

programme.title: Curse Of Chucky
programme.desc: He's back! From the filmmakers that brought you Chucky comes the terrifying return of the pint-sized doll possessed by the spirit of a notorious serial killer.

programme.title: Cult Of Chucky
programme.desc: Confined to an asylum for the criminally insane for the past four years, Nica (Fiona Dourif) is wrongly convinced that she, not Chucky, murdered her entire family.

programme.title: Carrie
programme.desc: A reimagining of the classic horror tale about Carrie White, a shy girl outcast by her peers and sheltered by her deeply religious mother, who unleashes telekinetic terror on her small town after being pushed too far at her senior prom.

programme.title: Horsemen
programme.desc: A detective is investigates a series of murders that are based on the biblical prophecies concerning the Four Horsemen of the ApocalypseWar, Famine, Pestilence, and Deathand discovers a terrifying link between himself and the suspects.

programme.title: The Crow
programme.desc: A man brutally murdered comes back to life as an undead avenger of his and his fiance's murder.
A man writing a book about the paranormal travels to New York and stays in a hotel room that has been said to be responsible for the death of all the guests that come to stay.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: When a kingpin threatens New York City, a news reporter find a quad of mutants which makes an alliance to unravel Shredder's plan as the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out Of The Shadows
programme.desc: Now the brothers must team up with April O'Neil and their new ally Casey Jones, to battle their enemies and face their biggest threat: the notorious Krang.

programme.title: Insomnia
programme.desc: Two Los Angeles homicide detectives are dispatched to a northern town where the sun doesn't set to investigate the methodical murder of a local teen.

programme.title: The Ninth Gate
programme.desc: Dean Corso is a rare book dealer with a taste for the finer things in life. When he is tasked with hunting down a dangerous sorcery book, he finds himself caught up in the chilling world of black magic, where he soon realizes he is out of his depth.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: An unlikely group of former '80s video game champions step up to save the world from an alien invasion in this visually spectacular action-adventure.

programme.title: After Earth
programme.desc: A crash landing leaves teenager Kitai Raige (Jaden Smith) and his legendary father Cypher (Will Smith) stranded on Earth, 1,000 years after cataclysmic events forced humanitys escape.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out Of The Shadows
programme.desc: Now the brothers must team up with April O'Neil and their new ally Casey Jones, to battle their enemies and face their biggest threat: the notorious Krang.

programme.title: Lake Placid

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Unseen Adventures S1 Ep1

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - A Friend in Need Ep2
programme.desc: Meet more Amazing Animal Friends including Charlotte, a schnauzer who enjoys bath time with her guinea pig pal Wallace, and a randy ram called Hamish who likes to sneak off to live with a herd of dairy cows instead of his own kind.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - A Wild Education Ep1
programme.desc: Welcome baby orangutan Topan, an orphan in need of a surrogate mom. Watch her learning journey in nursery school while her fellow students move through junior, senior, and wild-immersion schools. Meanwhile, 16-year-old Kasper preps for graduation.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - Lean on Me Ep2
programme.desc: Observe blossoming friendships and interspecies bonds in nursery school, and peek inside a bromance among junior-school buds Valentino, Yutris and Madara. See distractible Beni lean into his love of food and get a beating from a more-senior pupil.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 - Cook Islands/ Kūki 'Airani Ep6
programme.desc: Travel to the Cook Islands, the destination of choice for 3,000 humpback whales ready to mate and raise their young. Witness giant clams and green turtles thriving in the islands massive coral reef and get a glimpse into our evolutionary past.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 3 - Absent Friends Ep5
programme.desc: Hunt for missing nursery-class orphan Lahei and see shy Rumba try her weak left hand in a nest-building session. Watch younger Delilah school Bumi in class, then find out if Beni and Valentino will make the grade and finally earn their freedom.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 3 - Graduation Day Ep6
programme.desc: Congratulate the new Orangutan Jungle School graduates, who arent all spring chickens. Follow the convoy to the release site, where the team bids their friends a poignant farewell, then enjoy raucous celebrations as Molly and Bumi move up a grade.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - One Very Lost Sea Turtle Ep3
programme.desc: Follow the team in healing and releasing a grumpy sea turtle, and then meet a sea lion with an unusual injury that must be taken by crane to the rescue centre. Find out how the vet aids an aging fruit bat and a community rescues a one-eyed seal pup.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - A Wild Education Ep1
programme.desc: Welcome baby orangutan Topan, an orphan in need of a surrogate mom. Watch her learning journey in nursery school while her fellow students move through junior, senior, and wild-immersion schools. Meanwhile, 16-year-old Kasper preps for graduation.

programme.title: Macaque Island 1 - Clash of the Alphas Ep3
programme.desc: Stand back when a brawl erupts after the Street Troop finds the Hill Troop on their turf. Assess Matnoors poor parenting skills, see alpha wannabe Ajit make his move, then cool off as a heat wave pushes everyone to share the wealth in the forest.

programme.title: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn
programme.desc: An Australian family go on an adventure to restore an old hunting ranch in South Africa. Their goal is to rebuild the overgrown habitat, create an eco-tourism ranch, and allow the natural wildlife, including predators, to move back in.

programme.desc: Hunt for missing nursery-class orphan Lahei and see shy Rumba try her weak left hand in a nest-building session. Watch younger Delilah school Bumi in class, then find out if Beni and Valentino will make the grade and finally earn their freedom.

programme.desc: An Australian family go on an adventure to restore an old hunting ranch in South Africa. Their goal is to rebuild the overgrown habitat, create an eco-tourism ranch, and allow the natural wildlife, including predators, to move back in.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - One Very Lost Sea Turtle Ep3
programme.desc: Follow the team in healing and releasing a grumpy sea turtle, and then meet a sea lion with an unusual injury that must be taken by crane to the rescue centre. Find out how the vet aids an aging fruit bat and a community rescues a one-eyed seal pup.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - A Friend in Need Ep2
programme.desc: Meet more Amazing Animal Friends including Charlotte, a schnauzer who enjoys bath time with her guinea pig pal Wallace, and a randy ram called Hamish who likes to sneak off to live with a herd of dairy cows instead of his own kind.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 - Masters of Defence Ep5
programme.desc: Staying alive is job one for these masters of defence. With clever adaptations like mimicry and poison on their side, they continue to outwit predators.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 - Monkey Garden Ep1
programme.desc: Explore the southern edge of the Pantanal, where brown capuchin monkeys live in their own Garden of Eden. Dry season in the highlands treats them well until a drought dries up their food sources. Can an industrious agouti save them from starvation?

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 - Bird Paradise Ep2
programme.desc: Every year, the southern wetlands of the Pantanal become a bird paradise as over 650 species of rare and iconic birds congregate here for the breeding season.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 - Peccary Party Ep3
programme.desc: Trek through the forests and savannahs of the Pantanals Nhecolndia region, which is home to noisy herds of peccaries. Follow these pig-like mammals on their daily food-foraging routes, and run into roseate spoonbills and capybaras along the way.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 - Jaguar Den Ep4
programme.desc: In the heart of Brazil, the largest cat in the Americas, the magnificent jaguar, reigns over a magical land filled with natural beauty and diversity.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 - Cat Country Ep5
programme.desc: Join a group of wildlife scientists tracking the comeback of the ocelot in the Pantanal. Check in on their network of trail cameras, which capture the movements of this elusive spotted cat, and see the perils it faces, including giant anacondas.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 - Amazon Monkeys Ep6
programme.desc: Get an inside look at the Pantanals most extraordinary primate families. Check out the ear-splitting cries of howler monkeys, the fearless leaps of curious saki monkeys, and the agile tails of highly intelligent white-whiskered spider monkeys.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 - Capybara's Pond Ep7
programme.desc: At the northern edge of the Pantanal, in one of the largest tropical wetlands on Earth, is a small pond that is home to an unusual family of rodents. They are not your typical rats or squirrels - these giants are the size of sheep!

programme.title: Island of the Monsoon 1 - From Cloud to Coast Ep5
programme.desc: Monsoon storms sweep over the tropical island of Sri Lanka, and water carried in with swirling mists hits the mountainous heartland, beginning a journey through the many changing faces of the islands forests.

programme.title: Island of the Monsoon 1 - Life on the Wing Ep6
programme.desc: Yala National Park is an avian Eden, home to 215 species of bird. This paradise offers many possibilities for parents who can weather the ever-changing climate. Every species must either raise their offspring here or find a new home before the dry season ends and the monsoon storms begin.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - Baby Sea Otter Finds a Family Ep1
programme.desc: Join the vet and his team in saving a massive sea lion caught in a plastic noose, and then visit the Rescue Center, where a harbor seal pup may lose its eyesight and a baby sea otter needs a risky but life-saving surgery.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - Battle to Save a Sea Lion Ep2
programme.desc: Battle wind and waves to find a sea lion trapped in a plastic ring. Then visit the rescue center, where over 80 orphan seals must be fed several times a day to prepare for release into the wild, and see an Amazonian duck get a miraculous operation.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - One Very Lost Sea Turtle Ep3
programme.desc: Follow the team in healing and releasing a grumpy sea turtle, and then meet a sea lion with an unusual injury that must be taken by crane to the rescue centre. Find out how the vet aids an aging fruit bat and a community rescues a one-eyed seal pup.

programme.title: The Hungry Games: Alaska's Big Bear Challenge 1 - Welcome to the Tundra Ep1
programme.desc: Wake up post-hibernation with 7 ravenous bears as Stage 1 of the competition kicks off. Battle wolves with new mom BoldFace, see tiny Stomper vie for power and Blondies love, and stand back as grizzled vet Bernie brawls with clueless teen Casanova.

programme.title: The Hungry Games: Alaska's Big Bear Challenge 1 - Slammin' Salmon Ep2
programme.desc: Join the frantic dash to cash in on Julys salmon run with the Stage 1 winners and some tough new recruits. Tag along on BigBoi's food-finding road trip, welcome QuadMom and RedBack to the feast, and see if BoldFace can keep her surviving cub safe.

programme.title: The Hungry Games: Alaska's Big Bear Challenge 1 - So Long and Thanks for All the Fish Ep3
programme.desc: Bundle up as an icy October storm complicates the race to the finish line. See Big Boi bounce after a stumble before tragedy hits QuadMom, and cheer as fan fave BoldFace hits her stride despite her clingy kid, Raccoon. But who will wear the crown?

programme.title: Wild Crusades 1 - Search for the Secret Bear Ep1
programme.desc: The forests of Yala National Park are home to the enigmatic sloth bear. Shy by nature, this animal is seldom seen and rarely filmed. Join a team of wildlife filmmakers as they reveal this mysterious bears life and behaviour as never seen before.

programme.title: Wild Crusades 1 - The Elephant Dilemma Ep2
programme.desc: Theres a new arrival at the Elephant Transit Home: a sick elephant calf abandoned near a reserve, another victim in the battle for space between humans and elephants. Study the innovative efforts to end this conflict, led by Dr. Pruthu Fernando.

programme.title: Wild Crusades 1 - The Monkey Diaries Ep3
programme.desc: Hidden in the jungles of Sri Lanka is the toque macaque. Endemic to the island, these feisty group-living monkeys are found nowhere else on earth. And they are at the heart of the longest primate research project ever undertaken. Dr Wolfgang Dittus is on a quest to understand their complex society.

programme.title: The Hungry Games: Alaska's Big Bear Challenge 1 - Welcome to the Tundra Ep1
programme.desc: Wake up post-hibernation with 7 ravenous bears as Stage 1 of the competition kicks off. Battle wolves with new mom BoldFace, see tiny Stomper vie for power and Blondies love, and stand back as grizzled vet Bernie brawls with clueless teen Casanova.

programme.title: The Hungry Games: Alaska's Big Bear Challenge 1 - Slammin' Salmon Ep2
programme.desc: Join the frantic dash to cash in on Julys salmon run with the Stage 1 winners and some tough new recruits. Tag along on BigBoi's food-finding road trip, welcome QuadMom and RedBack to the feast, and see if BoldFace can keep her surviving cub safe.

programme.title: The Hungry Games: Alaska's Big Bear Challenge 1 - So Long and Thanks for All the Fish Ep3

programme.title: Wild Crusades 1 - Search for the Secret Bear Ep1
programme.desc: The forests of Yala National Park are home to the enigmatic sloth bear. Shy by nature, this animal is seldom seen and rarely filmed. Join a team of wildlife filmmakers as they reveal this mysterious bears life and behaviour as never seen before.

programme.title: Wild Crusades 1 - The Elephant Dilemma Ep2
programme.desc: Theres a new arrival at the Elephant Transit Home: a sick elephant calf abandoned near a reserve, another victim in the battle for space between humans and elephants. Study the innovative efforts to end this conflict, led by Dr. Pruthu Fernando.

programme.title: Wild Crusades 1 - The Monkey Diaries Ep3
programme.desc: Hidden in the jungles of Sri Lanka is the toque macaque. Endemic to the island, these feisty group-living monkeys are found nowhere else on earth. And they are at the heart of the longest primate research project ever undertaken. Dr Wolfgang Dittus is on a quest to understand their complex society.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 - Monkey Garden Ep1
programme.desc: Explore the southern edge of the Pantanal, where brown capuchin monkeys live in their own Garden of Eden. Dry season in the highlands treats them well until a drought dries up their food sources. Can an industrious agouti save them from starvation?

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 - Bird Paradise Ep2
programme.desc: Every year, the southern wetlands of the Pantanal become a bird paradise as over 650 species of rare and iconic birds congregate here for the breeding season.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 - Water Warriors Ep6
programme.desc: From powerful sharks to mysterious and beautiful fish shoals, the underwater dynamic between predator and prey continues. Evolution is on display in these clever creatures as they use all their skills to survive.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - Horses of the Sun Ep3
programme.desc: Grvys zebras population has dropped by 50% in less than 20 years. Environmentalists say that if we arent vigilant, they could disappear all together. Lewa Conservancy is at the heart of efforts to protect the species so that they can replenish their numbers

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - Vanishing Wilderness Ep4
programme.desc: Kenya's growing human population is taking land and resources away from wildlife. The squeeze is creating increasing numbers of conflicts between humans and animals, and is one of the biggest issues in African conservation.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - A Place in the Wild Ep5
programme.desc: Kenya takes a major step with the opening of its first community-run rhino sanctuary in the heart of Samburu territory. The threat to Kenyas rhinos from armed, illegal poaching gangs is the highest it's been in 40 years, which makes the sanctuary vital.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 - Masked Bandits Ep6
programme.desc: Capture teams from Kenya head to Somali border to capture 50 rare and endangered antelope called a hirola. The hirola numbers have been plummeting over the last decade, and conservation groups know that by capturing and placing them into a protected predator-free conservancy they will rebound.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks 1 - Reef Wrecks of Bonaire Ep1
programme.desc: Bonaires fringing reef is home to thousands of species of corals, fish and other marine animals. It is also home to a collection of stunning shipwrecks. These wrecks evolve over time, becoming artificial reefs that support an incredibly diverse marine habitat.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks 1 - Florida Keys Shipwreck Trail Ep2
programme.desc: The Florida Keys is the first line of defence for the southern US. With a rich naval history and a coastal lifestyle, its easy to believe locals who claim these waters are home to as many as 1000 shipwrecks.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks 1 - Bahamas Hollywood Wrecks Ep3
programme.desc: The Bahamas is known as the underwater movie capital of the world. Hollywood has been coming here for decades, making epic movies and TV shows in its crystal clear waters, leaving behind a host of cinematic shipwrecks.

programme.title: Osprey: Sea Raptor
programme.desc: Wade into a saltwater marsh along the Connecticut River to witness the heartwarming reunion of two ospreys whove been mates for a decade. Witness their highs and lows over a single summer as they raise their chicks and dodge a host of predators.

programme.title: Animals at Play 1 - The Power of Playtime Ep1
programme.desc: Explore the ways that animals use play, including young gibbons in Thailand that practice falling from branches, elderly macaques that preserve their brains with playtime, and games that sharpen the profound intelligence of African elephants.

programme.title: Animals at Play 1 - Rules of the Game Ep2
programme.desc: Young hyenas compete in tug of war, mischievous parrots play at picking apart tourists cars, and Atlantic spotted dolphins enjoy sophisticated social games amid seaweedall following specific rules that hone social bonds.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - Born to Be Different Ep1
programme.desc: This episode of Amazing Animal Friends features a duck that wont go in the water without a ride from her pooch pal, an elephant that thinks shes a buffalo, and a herd of cows that adopt an orphaned deer.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - A Friend in Need Ep2
programme.desc: Meet more Amazing Animal Friends including Charlotte, a schnauzer who enjoys bath time with her guinea pig pal Wallace, and a randy ram called Hamish who likes to sneak off to live with a herd of dairy cows instead of his own kind.

programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands with Eoin Warner 1 - Sea of Serpents Ep1
programme.desc: Begin on Rathlin, where flightless guillemot chicks take a leap of faith and golden hares welcome the dawn. Head to Tory to see basking sharks, dolphins, and the endangered corncrakes dance of love. Then chase adorable Irish stoats across Achill.

programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands with Eoin Warner 1 - Edge of the Abyss Ep2
programme.desc: Continue the odyssey along Irelands west coast. Spy on the love affairs of grey seals in the Inishkea Islands and ply Connemaras turquoise waters. Wander in Clares magical woods and catch hundreds of basking sharks engaged in a mating display.

programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands with Eoin Warner 1 - Echoes of the Past Ep3
programme.desc: Learn how Arctic terns negotiate a 50,000-mile-a-year commute to summer in Kerrys Maharee Islands. Go whale-watching off Brandon Head, then witness Irelands greatest wildlife spectacle: a 1,000-strong colony of grey seals on Great Blasket Island.

programme.title: Monkey Island 1 - A Mother's Tale Ep1
programme.desc: The jungle of Sri Lanka is a monkeys paradise. But not everyone here is equal. Anna sits at the bottom of the social ladder. And with a newborn baby, life is getting tougher. As drought grips the region tensions boil over. Anna is a devoted mother. But can she do enough to keep her son alive?

programme.title: Monkey Island 1 - Leaving Home Ep2
programme.desc: An ancient citadel once home to Sri Lankas kings has now been reclaimed by the jungle and theres a new dynasty in power. Monkeys.

programme.title: Monkey Island 1 - Trouble in Paradise Ep3
programme.desc: Tensions rise when drought overtakes an ancient Sri Lankan temple shared by tufted grey langurs, toque macaques, and purple-faced leaf monkeys. Witness the drama as the lower-ranking primates struggle to stay hydrated amid a mutinous plot.

programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands with Eoin Warner 1 - Sea of Serpents Ep1
programme.desc: Begin on Rathlin, where flightless guillemot chicks take a leap of faith and golden hares welcome the dawn. Head to Tory to see basking sharks, dolphins, and the endangered corncrakes dance of love. Then chase adorable Irish stoats across Achill.
